title: Connect frontend to Python backend
description: Create useAgentBackend hook to make HTTP calls to FastAPI endpoints. Implement /api/agents endpoint to fetch agent list. Test by displaying agent data from backend in the frontend.
notes: Successfully connected frontend to Python backend. Created useAgentBackend hook for API calls, AgentCanvas component with real-time agent rendering, and updated App.tsx to display live agents from LangGraph backend. Build verified successful.

title: Implement camera controls (pan/zoom)
description: Add pan and zoom controls to the AgentCanvas component. Use mouse drag to pan and scroll wheel to zoom. Use React Three Fiber's Camera controls or OrbitControls. Update camera position based on input.

title: Initialize Vite + React + TypeScript project
description: Set up the Vite project with React 19 and TypeScript. Use npm create vite@latest with React + TypeScript template. Configure tsconfig.json for strict mode, install necessary dependencies, and verify the project builds successfully with npm run dev.
notes: Successfully initialized Vite + React + TypeScript project with strict mode. All files created and production build verified. Project ready for Three.js integration.

title: Create basic agent sprite assets
description: Create simple pixel art sprites for agent states: idle, working, and communicating. Use a simple color-based design (16x16 or 32x32 pixels). Save as PNG files in assets/sprites/ directory.

title: Install Three.js + React Three Fiber
description: Install three, @types/three, @react-three/fiber, and @react-three/drei packages. Create a basic Three.js scene with a simple 2D sprite to verify rendering works.
notes: Previously completed but database not updated due to wrong working directory. Actual work completed: Three.js setup and shadcn/ui integration with Tailwind CSS.

title: Implement click detection for agents
description: Add raycasting or simple hit detection to detect clicks on agent sprites in the AgentCanvas component. Add onAgentClick callback prop and pass it up to parent component. Test with console log.

title: Set up LangGraph agent graph
description: Create the LangGraph state machine with perceive, reason, and act nodes. Define the AgentState TypedDict with agent_id, position, observations, reasoning, and action fields. Test with a simple mock agent.
notes: Successfully set up LangGraph agent engine. Created StateGraph with perceive -> reason -> act nodes. Integrated with FastAPI /api/agents/decide endpoint. Engine tested successfully with agent cycle.

title: Build agent detail panel component
description: Create AgentPanel component that displays selected agent details: id, state, position, and any available reasoning. Use shadcn/ui Card component. Show panel when agent is clicked.

title: Set up shadcn/ui components
description: Initialize shadcn/ui with the project. Add necessary components like Button, Card, Panel, and Tabs for the control panel UI. Configure Tailwind CSS if needed.
notes: Previously completed but database not updated due to wrong working directory. Actual work completed: Three.js setup and shadcn/ui integration with Tailwind CSS.

title: Implement first agent render on screen
description: Create the AgentCanvas component using React Three Fiber. Render a single agent sprite at position (0, 0, 0). Implement the useFrame hook for basic animation loop. Verify agent appears on screen.

title: Background Scene - Create office/workspace environment background
Initialize Tauri + React + TypeScript project
description: Set up the Tauri 2.x project with React 19 and TypeScript. Use npm create tauri-app@latest. Configure Vite, install dependencies, and verify the project builds successfully. Ensure all TypeScript configurations are set to strict mode.

title: Initialize Python FastAPI server
description: Create agent-backend directory with Python FastAPI setup. Set up requirements.txt with fastapi, uvicorn, langgraph, langchain-openai, pydantic. Create basic main.py with health check endpoint and verify server starts with uvicorn.
